snippet: A military court in the Democratic Republic of Congo has sentenced two soldiers to life in prison in connection with a mass rape in 2012.
abstract: Military court in the Democratic Republic of Congo sentences two soldiers to life in prison in connection with 2012 mass rape of at least 97 women and 33 girls in the eastern town of Minova.
lead_paragraph: A military court in the Democratic Republic of Congo has sentenced two soldiers to life in prison in connection with a mass rape in 2012.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
